items.title: The Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW): Among the Best Performing Dow Stocks So Far in 2025
items.description: We recently published a list of 11 Best Performing Dow Stocks So Far in 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) stands against other best performing Dow stocks so far in 2025.
